sake zagayowar koyarwa: Matakan da CPU ke bi don aiwatar da umarni guda ɗaya
superscalar gine: Tsarin CPU wanda zai iya aiwatar da umarni da yawa a kowane zagaye na agogo
tsinkayar reshe: Dabarar inda CPU ke ƙoƙarin tantance hanyar da sharadi zai bi
arewabridge: Chipset (tsofaffin tsarin) wanda ya haɗa CPU zuwa RAM da bas masu sauri
kudubridge: Chipset (tsofaffin tsarin) waɗanda ke sarrafa na'urori masu hankali da I/O
hyperthreading: Fasaha da ke ba da damar cibiyar CPU guda ɗaya ta bayyana azaman maɓalli masu ma'ana da yawa
risc: Rage Umarni Saita Kwamfuta - ƙirar CPU tare da umarni mafi sauƙi
cisc: Saita Kwamfuta Mai Ruɗi - Tsarin CPU tare da ƙaƙƙarfan umarni masu rikitarwa
simd: Umarni Guda Maɗaukaki Data, dabara don sarrafa bayanai a layi daya
micro Architecture: Takaitattun bayanan aiwatarwa na saitin umarni na CPU
tsarin a guntu: Haɗa abubuwa da yawa (CPU, GPU, da sauransu) akan guntu ɗaya
saka tsarin: Tsarin kwamfuta da aka keɓe don takamaiman aiki, sau da yawa a cikin babbar na'ura
firmware: Software na dindindin da aka adana akan na'urar hardware (kamar BIOS)
overclocking: Gudun CPU a cikin sauri fiye da ƙayyadaddun da aka yi niyya
lambar gyara kuskure: Dabarar ganowa da gyara kurakurai a cikin RAM
daga aiwatar da oda: Dabarar inda CPU ke aiwatar da umarni cikin tsari mafi inganci
\u0199ididdigar \u0199ididdiga: Ƙa'idodin amfani da kayan aikin ƙididdiga don ƙididdigewa
neuromorphic kwamfuta: Gine-ginen ƙididdiga na kwakwalwa wanda aka tsara don ayyukan AI
